query:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_anexos_processed;

CREATE VIEW vw_anexos_processed AS
SELECT 
  s.id,
  s.entityType AS entity_type,
  s.entityId AS entity_id,
  s.label,
  s.url,
  s.attachmentUrl AS attachment_url,
  s.attachmentType AS attachment_type,
  s.extractedText AS extracted_text,
  s.extractedEntities AS extracted_entities,
  s.confidenceScore AS confidence_score,
  s.processedAt AS processed_at,
  s.processedBy AS processed_by,
  s.createdAt AS created_at,
  CASE 
    WHEN s.processedAt IS NOT NULL THEN 'processed'
    ELSE 'pending'
  END AS status,
  CASE 
    WHEN s.confidenceScore >= 0.9 THEN 'high'
    WHEN s.confidenceScore >= 0.7 THEN 'medium'
    WHEN s.confidenceScore > 0 THEN 'low'
    ELSE 'unknown'
  END AS confidence_level,
  CHAR_LENGTH(COALESCE(s.extractedText, '')) AS text_length,
  JSON_LENGTH(COALESCE(s.extractedEntities, '[]')) AS entities_count
FROM ai_sources s
WHERE s.attachmentUrl IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY s.createdAt DESC;

  s.processedAt AS processed_at,
  s.processedBy AS processed_by,
  s.createdAt AS created_at,
  CASE 
    WHEN s.processedAt IS NOT NULL THEN 'processed'
    ELSE 'pending'
  END AS status,
  CASE 
    WHEN s.confidenceScore >= 0.9 THEN 'high'
    WHEN s.confidenceScore >= 0.7 THEN 'medium'
    WHEN s.confidenceScore > 0 THEN 'low'
    ELSE 'unknown'
  END AS confidence_level,
  CHAR_LENGTH(COALESCE(s.extractedText, '')) AS text_length,

WHERE s.attachmentUrl IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY s.createdAt DESC;
